      • StudentFee

        public StudentFee(int creditHours,
                  double feePerCreditHour,
                  double scholarshipAmount,
                  double healthInsurancePerAnnum)
        This is a constructor for the class "StudentFee" taking four parameters.
        Parameters:
        creditHours - Number of credits hours a student enrolls in.
        feePerCreditHour - Fee per each credit hour.
        scholarshipAmount - scholarship amount for a student.
        healthInsurancePerAnnum - health insurance amount for annum.

        public double tuitionFee()
        This method is used to calculate the tution fee foe each student.The tuition fee depends on the number of credit hours student enrolled in.
        Returns:
        returns the calculated tution fee by multiplying Number of credit hours with Fee per credit hour.
